code-vb.pre-render:
Dim repRoot as Control = FindControl("VisualizerSection") If repRoot Is Nothing repRoot = Me End If
If repRoot.Controls.Count > 0 AndAlso repRoot.Controls(0).Controls.Count > 0 AndAlso repRoot.Controls(0).Controls(0).GetType() Is GetType(GridView) Then Dim grid as GridView = repRoot.Controls(0).Controls(0) If grid.Controls.Count > 0 Then For Each row As GridViewRow In grid.Controls(0).Controls For Each cell As TableCell In row.Cells cell.Text = Tokenize(cell.Text, ModuleConfiguration, False, False) Next Next End If End If
